Event.Channel: This is the Analytic channel to which internal Analytic events from the USBXHCI driver are sent.
Event.Message: USBXHCI Controller Error detected. To recover from this Error, Windows may need to reset the Controller and re-enumerate USB devices downstream of the Controller. Please refer Event Properties for more contextual information about this Error. Hardware Verifier Flag: %4. Detailed description: %5
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="fid_UcxController" inType="win:Pointer" outType="win:HexInt64"/> <data name="fid_UcxDevice" inType="win:Pointer" outType="win:HexInt64"/> <data name="fid_UcxEndpoint" inType="win:Pointer" outType="win:HexInt64"/> <data name="fid_HWVerifierFlag" inType="win:UInt64" outType="win:HexInt64"/> <data name="fid_Description" inType="win:AnsiString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="fid_CommandTRB" inType="win:Binary" outType="xs:hexBinary" length="16"/> <data name="fid_EventTRB" inType="win:Binary" outType="xs:hexBinary" length="16"/> </template>

Event.Message: xHCI Command waitlisted due to Command Ring full or Command Serialization
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="fid_UcxController" inType="win:Pointer" outType="win:HexInt64"/> <data name="fid_CrbPointer" inType="win:Pointer" outType="win:HexInt64"/> <data name="fid_Command_TRB" inType="win:Binary" outType="xs:hexBinary" length="16"/> <data name="fid_CommandWaitlistReason" inType="win:UInt8" outType="xs:unsignedByte"/> </template>
